rows.label: qst711301_msg0001
rows.name:
Traveler... you look strong,
so I have a request for you.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0002
rows.name:
There are Feris living around
this village of Hyber, right?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0003
rows.name:
Could you defeat them and collect
some Feris Beastmeat for me?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0004
rows.name:
Normally, I'd hunt and
get it myself, but...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0005
rows.name:
They've become ferocious lately,
and I can't handle them...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0006
rows.name:
But without Feris Beastmeat, I
can't make Hyber Meatball Stew...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0007
rows.name:
That means the only famous dish at
Teo-jii-san's inn will disappear.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0008
rows.name: And my son will go hungry...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0009
rows.name: What do you say? Will you help me?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0203
rows.name:
With this, the famous dish at
Teo-jii-san's inn is safe for a while.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0204
rows.name: I can feed my son until he's full.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0206
rows.name:
As you can see, this village
is desolate, and we live
on the edge every day.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0207
rows.name:
So... I'll teach you the
recipe for Hyber Meatball
Stew. Will you accept that?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0208
rows.name:
Teo-jii-san might get mad if
he finds out, but... beggars
can't be choosers, right?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0210
rows.name: Make it delicious for me. Thanks.
